TopicTitle: War Of Insanity: The Animated Series! LOOKING FOR VOICE ACTORS AND CONCEPT ARTISTS

Articles.Content:
A few of you may remember the popular thread War Of Insanity created by me. It eventually evolved into an role playing story http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127950-War-Of-Insanity!?highlight=war+insanity and was locked. Now it has it's own forum else found here: http://warofinsanity.freeforums.net/

Anyway, me and sampa have begun working together to animate the series. We've begun recruiting voice actors, Concept artists, and everything else we need for an animated series. PM either me or Sampa to apply for a role in the series.

Animators: Starwhip (Characters) Sampa (Everything else.)

SCRIPT: Darkjunior

AFTER EFFECTS: Tristonwilson12

VOICE ACTORS: TBA

CONCEPT ARIST(S): TBA

Thanks! PM Sampa or me if you have any questions!

Edited October 19, 2015 by Dark Junior

I'll make a post here so you can find me easily.

- - - Updated - - -

To be more specific:

Voice actors, please provide us with an excerpt of what you can do and we can set up a,skype chat for a try out on different character types. We need both male and female voices.

Concept artists: please provide us with an exampleof your work or alink to past works.
Just for people's awareness, we are still searching!
I'm ready for stuff to do

What kind of voices are you looking for? are your characters gruff, british, christopher walken, quiet and shy, or boisterous, ect? Some VA work might be a fun little side project I might consider. Tell me what voices you might be looking for and post some lines you want for "auditions" of sorts. I might give something a shot and post a vocaroo link here, we shall see.

What kind of voices are you looking for? are your characters gruff, british, christopher walken, quiet and shy, or boisterous, ect? Some VA work might be a fun little side project I might consider. Tell me what voices you might be looking for and post some lines you want for "auditions" of sorts. I might give something a shot and post a vocaroo link here, we shall see.

I can't officially say, but I think that any voices are welcome at this point.

I'm going to poke around and look for some good lines to suggest to the group.

What kind of voices are you looking for? are your characters gruff, british, christopher walken, quiet and shy, or boisterous, ect? Some VA work might be a fun little side project I might consider. Tell me what voices you might be looking for and post some lines you want for "auditions" of sorts. I might give something a shot and post a vocaroo link here, we shall see.

Well, it's a sci-fi series. At least, my character's gonna be kinda like Central Officer Bradford from XCOM. I'm pretty sure you can find him on youtube.

Also, our script is nearly done. It'll be ready by Oct. 30. Maybe we should wait and I'll send you the script soon.

That, or I send you a few lines. Whichever you prefer.
I apologize for not having much done at this point. Been grounded for a bit so no access to my laptop until today.
Potential Voice Actors: When we get some lines prepared, we will send them to you a day ahead for practice, then, we will set up a skype voice chat so you can show us what you can do.

Potential Voice Actors: When we get some lines prepared, we will send them to you a day ahead for practice, then, we will set up a skype voice chat so you can show us what you can do.

I would suggest giving a larger window. People's schedules can be very unforgiving.

Also, concept art would be a nice thing to get started on soon, if we want this off the ground. Getting models and textures finalized can take a looooooong time.

Good idea! I've been rather busy so, need to get on a few...I CAN send you a concept picture for Xannari

Is this still going to happen?

 

I wanna help somehow, Preeeetttyyyyyyy Pleeeeeeaaaassseee?

EDIT: What does a concept artist do? Design things in KSP? TELL ME!

On 1/1/2016 at 2:18 PM, SpaceplaneAddict said:

What does a concept artist do? Design things in KSP? TELL ME!

The concept artist draws out the concepts.

For example, drawing Xannari's exotic spacecraft, or the map of the galaxy, or...

The concept artist draws out the concepts.

For example, drawing Xannari's exotic spacecraft, or the map of the galaxy, or...

exactly, trainengie!  btw, long time no see!

 

btw, just a small update, we are still working on this project, but due to school, I have been delayed on learning animation.

On 1/7/2016 at 0:43 AM, Sampa said:

we are still working on this project, but due to school, I have been delayed on learning animation.

Maybe I can cover for you some.

I've figured out how to do believable procedurally generated planetary bodies with Blender. Surface, atmosphere, and clouds. The following images aren't run through any external programs.

Earthlike planet. (Low resolution test render)

Spoiler

A moon or airless world.

Spoiler

The setup I have is quite easy to adapt to any imaginable planet, be it covered in lava or frozen to the core. There are a few limitations, but in general it should work for everything at an acceptable level.
Oh cool!  That would be great!  Thanks!
